attributes.action: Remove all parasites from this country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A law must be created forcing people who have never contributed to the UK in a positive economic fashion be forced to work and not be given free homes/land but sent home even if they are part of the EU.We are all for helping people in a humanitarian crisis but we are tired of this social and economic burden being forced upon us in the name of human rights.What ever happened to our human rights !

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
